rules_text:
[i](Devoid cards have no color.)[/i]
Whenever Erratic Decimator attacks, you may have target creature gain or lose a creature type of your choice until end of turn.
notes:
Inspiration — Eldrazi (directly), creatures from other worlds, (loosely) cosmic horror, strange convulsing/aggressive creatures

Mechanical Uniqueness — Devoid supertype

Assistance — Tribal effects
